input.sentences: my family members wore very neat colors that day .
we were all together and had a good time .
my daughter looked onto the horizon and talked about her dreams .
my brother wore his lucky necklace and brought a cup .
he also wore a crown to symbolize his birthday .
output.sentences: Today was our big family reunion.
I spoke to people I haven't seen in years.
My neice was all too happy to just take in the surroundings.
Her father insisted that we touch his good luck charm before hugging him.
Meanwhile, grandpa was busy being the head (or king) of the family.
